doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Azizul Haque Azad
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Azizul Haque Azad is a renowned medicine and rheumatology specialist in Rajshahi, holding prestigious qualifications such as MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), FRCP (Edinburgh), MRCP (UK), and MRCP SCE Rheumatology (UK). As a Professor of Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital, he provides expert care for conditions like rheumatoid arthritis, systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE), osteoarthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, and gout. With extensive experience in internal medicine, he offers comprehensive diagnosis and treatment for autoimmune and musculoskeletal disorders. Patients can consult him at Micropath Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi (Medical Mor, Laxmipur) from 4 PM to 11 PM daily.

doctor.name: Dr. Prabir Mohan Basak
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MRCP (UK), FRCP (EDIN), FACP (USA)
doctor.info: Dr. Prabir Mohan Basak is a distinguished medicine and rheumatology specialist in Rajshahi, with extensive qualifications including MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MRCP (UK), FRCP (Edinburgh), FACP (USA), and MRCP SCE Rheumatology (UK). He also holds the EULAR European Certificate of Rheumatology, showcasing his expertise in managing complex autoimmune and musculoskeletal disorders. As an Associate Professor of Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital, he specializes in treating rheumatoid arthritis, lupus (SLE), ankylosing spondylitis, osteoarthritis, and gout. Patients can consult him at Popular Diagnostic Center, Rajshahi (House # 474, Chowdhury Tower, Laxmipur) from 3 PM to 10 PM, except on Fridays.

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Rupali Yasmin
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Rupali Yasmin is a highly qualified Rheumatology specialist with an MBBS, BCS (Health), MD in Rheumatology from BSMMU, and ECRD certification from Switzerland. She specializes in diagnosing and treating various rheumatic diseases, including arthritis, gout, lupus, and chronic pain disorders. As a Consultant in Rheumatology at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital, she provides expert care to patients suffering from joint inflammation, autoimmune disorders, and musculoskeletal pain. Dr. Rupali Yasmin is available for consultations at Labaid Diagnostic, Rajshahi, located at House # 621, Shershah Road, Rajpara, Laxmipur, Rajshahi. Her visiting hours are from 3 PM to 8 PM, except on Thursdays and Fridays.

chamber.address: House # 621, Shershah Road, Rajpara, Laxmipur, Rajshahi
